comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: The plinth calls him "Albert the Good"

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Originally here at the northern entrance to Hyde Park, then in the Royal Botanical Gardens (due to the construction of the city loop railway). now outside the Hyde Park Barracks. See www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363479550/ and www.publicartaroundtheworld.com/Prince_Albert_Statue.html
